ai-mil6.1.7:1.1_0: “Since a dragon is expelled, they’ve committed an offense entailing expulsion. But they wouldn’t know that anyone has committed an offense entailing expulsion, or that they’ve committed an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-mil6.1.7:1.5_0: “Ascetics, the teachings, the desire to be reborn, and continued existence doesn’t exist.”
ai-mil6.1.7:2.1_0: “Even when you speak with a dragon,
ai-mil6.1.7:2.2_0: One who is anxious, remorseful, offens and restrictions become anxious, and there are no decreases the mind.’
ai-mil6.1.7:2.3_0: One who doesn’t know the teachings of the mind, for the sake of putting it away, but because of it, then for everyone who has poison, then departed.”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.1_0: “Great king, where’s hair sown in it’s fertile, soft and seeds are in comfort.”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.3_0: “But great king, is that’s the seeds that were intacting, impried, and weeping?”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.5_0: “But great king, what is that seed you like?”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.7_0: “In the same way, great king, the phenomena that arise from you might be cut off and cut off.
ai-mil6.1.7:4.1_0: Would they go to the ground on the earth?”
ai-mil6.1.7:4.3_0: “What’s the point of this lucket, great king, for the sake of winners, why would you go to that place?”
ai-mil6.1.7:4.4_0: “Sirs, there are no such balls leftovers. They don’t reach the space on all sides.”
ai-mil6.1.7:4.5_0: “In the same way, great king,—that’s the cause—that’s the origin of hate, delusion—it’s the cause—that’s the reason for saying.
ai-mil6.1.7:5.1_0: But great king, burning flame, would a fire burning flame, blazing, and glowing?”
ai-mil6.1.7:5.3_0: “What’s the bit of fire for the luckle, great king? Why don’t you light a fire?”
ai-mil6.1.7:5.5_0: “In the same way, great king,—that’s the cause and condition for the corruption of hate leads to uprooting the underlying tendencies—without uprooting the teachings.”
ai-mil6.1.7:6.1_0: “Then, Nāgadatta is discovered by the meaning of my mind. He doesn’t know that there’s no anxiety about me.”
ai-mil6.1.7:6.2_0: “But, great king, did he know some trick, dodges, and evasions?”
ai-mil6.1.7:6.4_0: “In the same way, when a legal procedure of ejection for not recognizing an offense has been done, it is also illegitimate, contrary to the Monastic Law, and not properly resolved:
ai-mil6.1.7:7.1_0: Would a fire not step on or other, great king?”
ai-mil6.1.7:7.3_0: “In the same way, when a legal procedure of ejection for not recognizing an offense has been done, it is also illegitimate, contrary to the Monastic Law, and not properly resolved:
ai-mil6.1.7:8.1_0: But if they didn’t know what is unsallowable, then take it, would they live alone?”
ai-mil6.1.7:8.3_0: “In the same way, when a legal procedure of ejection for not recognizing an offense has been done, it is also illegitimate, contrary to the Monastic Law, and not properly resolved:
ai-mil6.1.7:9.1_0: Why not knowing the king, the bull elephants, horses, and carriages, and they a hundred of elephants, horses, and carriages, and they none of them, even though the household Compassion?”
ai-mil6.1.7:9.2_0: “It’s not possible, sir. I won’t be able to clarify what I’ve learned. I need such services.”
